header_hero.title: Tynbiz a solution for your sales
header_hero.subtitle: Boost your online store sales

section_integration.title: Integrations
section_integration.description: Integrate Tynbiz into your online store. If you don't have an online store, you can create one with us on any of these platforms.

section_how.title: How it works?
section_how.description: Everything you need to know about how our product works.

step1.title: Register and link your store
step1.description: Create your account and connect your virtual store to our platform. In a few steps, you can manage customer service and real-time interactions in a centralized way.

step2.title: Set up your profile and availability
step2.description: Customize your seller profile, set your hours of attention, and organize your availability so that your customers can contact you when they need it, or plan future interactions.

step3.title: Create interaction events for your audience
step3.description: Organize and publish scheduled interaction events where your customers can join to get information about your products, promotions, or news. These events will be public, and you can attract more interested parties to your store.

step4.title: Receive private customer service requests
step4.description: Customers can send you private inquiries at any time. These interactions are confidential and will be between you and the customer, ensuring personalized and private service.

step5.title: Start personalized interactions with your customers
step5.description: Respond immediately to customer requests, either in real time or during scheduled events. You can address questions, resolve doubts, or guide buyers through a purchase process.

step6.title: Manage and track interactions
step6.description: Keep a complete history of all private and public interactions, allowing you to track each customer's progress, resolve recurring issues, and offer more efficient service in future interactions.

section_room.title: Use your shopping room
section_room.description: Users accessing their shopping room can perform the following actions:

action1.title: add products
action1.description: Users can add any product from an online store to their shopping room.

action2.title: Request to the seller
action2.description: Users can request assistance directly from the sales room.

action3.title: Send invitation
action3.description: Users can send invitations to friends, family, and others from their shopping room.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are working on the Tynbiz project for its upcoming launch. We participated in the first UNSCH Startup Competition and won third place.

story.title: How it started
story.description: In 2020, in the city of Ayacucho, a group of young entrepreneurs began developing basic systems. With few resources but great commitment, they helped some businesses. During those first years, they gained direct experience with the real needs of small businesses. In mid-2023, after observing a growing trend towards e-commerce, they identified a common problem in many online stores: customer service was slow, disorganized or non-existent. This is how the idea of creating a Tynbiz platform that is under development was born. The Tynbiz Startup will solve a large need for online consumers in a more interactive way for a more decisive purchase.
